definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the heaven believed in by many religions .
Synonym of celestial : of or pertaining to the heavens , the sky regarded as the realm of the sun , moon , planets , and stars .
Of or pertaining to the kingdom of God .
Strongly or sublimely beautiful or pleasurable .
examples: Oh, please continue giving me a massage—it's absolutely heavenly .

main_definition: Of or pertaining to the heaven believed in by many religions .
secondary_definitions: Synonym of celestial : of or pertaining to the heavens , the sky regarded as the realm of the sun , moon , planets , and stars .
Of or pertaining to the kingdom of God .
( figurative ) Strongly or sublimely beautiful or pleasurable .
